net.nutch.ndfs
Class NDFSFile

java.lang.Object
  java.io.File
      net.nutch.ndfs.NDFSFile
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable, Serializable
public class NDFSFile
extends File

NDFSFile is a traditional java File that's been annotated with some extra information.

Author:
Mike Cafarella
See Also:
Serialized Form
